result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise

result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre

result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
